scripts.db:run: docker start dynamodb && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate: aws dynamodb create-table --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --region localhost --table-name users-table-dev --attribute-definitions AttributeName=userId,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=userId,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=10,WriteCapacityUnits=5  --table-class STANDARD
